search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Vtiger CRM (vtiger.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page URL for Vtiger CRM is: [https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/](https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/)【3:0†source】.

citations.title: Vtiger CRM Pricing - Try it for free!

Generative AI Designer

Prediction AI Designer

**Booster Packs**

### Customize your CRM edition with additional features

Are feature limits holding you back? Use Vtiger Booster Packs add-ons and increase the limits of specific features without upgrading the plan. Pick what feature you want. Pay for the feature you use.

**1-Week implementation Challenge**

CRM Implementation made simple with commitment
----------------------------------------------

Join us to launch your CRM in just one week. With our expertise and Vtiger's easy setup, we'll quickly connect you to your prospects.

### Frequently Asked Questions

[**What’s the difference between Standard User and Single App User?**](https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/#f_q)Standard users have full access to five apps (Marketing, Sales, Help Desk, Projects and Inventory) and all modules. Single App users have complete access to one of the five apps (Marketing, Sales, Help Desk, Projects and Inventory) and read-only access to records in the other four apps.

[**Can I get a demo of Vtiger CRM?**](https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/#s_q)Yes, you can request a no-obligation demo of the latest cloud version of Vtiger CRM [from here](https://vtigerecs.od1.vtiger.com/appointments/meetwithus). Our experts will walk you through product capabilities and show how you can configure Vtiger to achieve your business goals.

[**Can I switch plans?**](https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/#t_q)You can change your existing plan at any point in time. You can either upgrade or downgrade the plan based on your necessity.

[**Have more questions?**](https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/#four_q)You can connect with us instantly through live chat (24x7) or by reaching to us at [\[email protected\]](https://www.vtiger.com/cdn-cgi/l/email-protection)

Not sure which plan to choose?

ONE GROWTH

A CRM for small and medium-sized businesses

Max users - 15

Max records - 100,000

Everything in

### Frequently Asked Questions

[**What’s the difference between Standard User and Single App User?**](https://www.vtiger.com/pricing/#f_q)Standard users have full access to five apps (Marketing, Sales, Help Desk, Projects and Inventory) and all modules. Single App users have complete access to one of the five apps (Marketing, Sales, Help Desk, Projects and Inventory) and read-only access to records in the other four apps.

Not sure which plan to choose?

pricing_data.pricing_notes: Vtiger CRM offers a free tier and booster packs for additional features.

additional_fees.fee_description: Add-ons to increase feature limits without upgrading the plan
